attr.name: system
attr.content: Defines the counter patterning system to be used. The available values are fixed, cyclic, alphabetic, numeric, symbolic, additive, and extends.

attr.name: symbols
attr.content: Defines the counter symbols to be used in the counter pattern. This descriptor is required for all marker systems except additive and extends.

attr.name: additive-symbols
attr.content: Defines the counter symbols to be used in additive counter patterns.

attr.name: prefix
attr.content: Defines a string or symbol to be included just before each counter in the pattern.

attr.name: suffix
attr.content: Defines a string or symbol to be included just after each counter in the pattern.

attr.name: negative
attr.content: Defines strings or symbol to be included around any negative-value counter.

attr.name: range
attr.content: Defines the range of values in which the counter pattern should be applied. Any counter outside the defined range uses the fallback counter style.

attr.name: fallback
attr.content: Defines the counter pattern that should be used when the value canâ€™t be represented by the primary counter pattern, or the value is outside a defined range for the counters.

attr.name: pad
attr.content: Defines a minimum number of characters for all counters in the pattern, with any extra space filled in with a defined symbol or set of symbols.

attr.name: speak-as
attr.content: Defines a strategy for speaking the counter in text-to-speech systems.
